import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { loginUser } from '../../store/AuthSlice' import { StyleFrom } from '../../style/StyleForm' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router' import logoHome from "../../images/mepelaozen.png" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Login() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const auth = useSelector((state)=>state.auth) const navigate = useNavigate() console.log(auth) useEffect(()=>{ if(auth._id){ navigate("/home") } },[auth._id,navigate]) const [user,setUser] = useState({ name:"", email:"", password:"" }) const handleSubmit = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(loginUser(user)) } return ( <> {/*

Login

setUser({...user,email:e.target.value})}/> setUser({...user,password:e.target.value})}/> {auth.loginStatus === "rejected" ?

{auth.loginError}

: null} */}

כניסה

setUser({...user,email:e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user,password:e.target.value})}/>
{auth.loginStatus === "נדחה" ?

{auth.loginError}

: null}

אין לך עדיין חשבון? לחץ כאן

) } export default Login
